Question: Lady Dartmouth, unpopular with this person, married Lord Spencer at Caxton Hall, London on 14 July 1976.
Hints: This person was eight years old when her parents divorced after her mother had an affair with Peter Shand Kydd.
Vine asserted her own abiding attraction to "the beauty and the tragedy of this person's life".
Within a month this person had begun seeing Dodi Fayed, son of her host that summer, Mohamed Al-Fayed.
